attributes.action: Provide Funding for Women and Children Fleeing Domestic Abuse with no recourse to Public Funding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Women who are brought into the UK and are abused by partner, family and or forced marriage should be able to access support/funding so they can access refuge or other services such as legal help and housing, the same as any woman of British Origin.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=Domestic+Abuse+
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
